sentences.english: In a bowl, combine the water, brown sugar, soy sauce, apple juice.
sentences.chinese: 在一碗中混合水，红糖，生抽，苹果汁。

sentences.english: We'd like a bottle of apple juice, a glass of orange juice and four cakes, please.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要一瓶苹果汁，一杯桔汁和四块蛋糕。

sentences.english: I'd like two ciders and a beer please.
sentences.chinese: 请来两杯苹果汁和一瓶啤酒。
请问你要苹果汁还是西瓜汁？

sentences.english: It is not used by yeasts during the fermentation process and contributes to the palate fullness of ciders (Pollard et al. , 1966).
sentences.chinese: 在发酵过程中没酵母感化并奉献在苹果汁地口胃上。

sentences.english: When choosing drinks, apple juice barely makes the top 10.
sentences.chinese: 当选择饮料的时候，苹果汁仅在第十位。

sentences.english: Perhaps after a few ciders, I’ll be able to think again.
sentences.chinese: 也许喝几杯苹果汁以后，我就又能进行思考了。

sentences.english: It had an apple-like flavor, but also like ginger ale.
sentences.chinese: 有苹果汁般的琥珀色，苹果风味，也像干姜水。

sentences.english: Flow injection chemiluminescence determination of meloxicam using potassium permanganate and formaldehyde system;
sentences.chinese: 并用流动注射化学发光法研究了苹果汁的抗氧化性能。

sentences.english: Order Taker: Orange juice and apple juice.
From the first day he arrived in this world, he was allowed to drink nothing but apple juice.
sentences.chinese: 从他第一天降临这个世界，只被允许喝苹果汁。

sentences.english: The alcoholic fermentation was developed independently of the cider-making technology and harvests.
sentences.chinese: 酒精地发酵自力于苹果汁消费工艺和果实地影响。

sentences.english: Sweeten dishes sparingly with honey, or concentrated apple or pear juice.
sentences.chinese: 加一点蜂蜜或浓缩苹果汁或梨汁，让菜带点甜味。

sentences.english: Stir Calvados, apple juice and lemon juice together over ice and strain into glass.
sentences.chinese: 搅拌卡巴度斯，苹果汁和柠檬汁一起加冰滤入玻璃杯。

sentences.english: We only have tomato juice and apple juice today.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天只有蕃茄汁和苹果汁。

definition: orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
